mapper.sql: ID_PROFILE_TABLE_RESULT AS profileTableResultId , ID_PROFILE_TABLE_COLUMN AS profileTableColumnId , INDICATOR_DATA_TYPE AS indicatorDataType , INDICATOR_DATA_LENGTH AS indicatorDataLength , INDICATOR_DATA_PRECISION AS indicatorDataPrecision , INDICATOR_DATA_SCALE AS indicatorDataScale , INDICATOR_ALL_COUNT AS indicatorAllCount , INDICATOR_DISTINCT_COUNT AS indicatorDistinctCount , INDICATOR_NULL_COUNT AS indicatorNullCount , INDICATOR_ZERO_COUNT AS indicatorZeroCount , INDICATOR_AGG_AVG AS indicatorAggAvg , INDICATOR_AGG_MAX AS indicatorAggMax , INDICATOR_AGG_MIN AS indicatorAggMin , CREATE_TIME AS createTime , EXECUTE_SQL AS executeSql , CREATE_USER AS createUser , UPDATE_USER AS updateUser , UPDATE_TIME AS updateTime , DEL_FLAG AS delFlag
